activities: Rivo Software Inc. provides risk management and compliance software solutions to enable companies to manage and optimize their Safety, Health and Environmental performance. Clients collect their own data using our software solutions and Rivo does not process any personal data regarding our clients' users of the system. Any personal information received by Rivo Software Inc. from the EU/EAA and/or Switzerland relates to prospective, current and former employees and, prospective, current and former clients.
personaldata: Prospective, current and former employees and, prospective, current and former clients.
privacyprograms: Rivo Software Inc. works in-line with the ISO 27001 Information Security Management System developed by Rivo’s UK-based company, Rivo Software Ltd. Rivo Software Limited is certified and externally audited against the ISO 27001 Information Security Management System.
recoursemech: For organization human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: American Arbitration Association (AAA)
